_sText:
MAP MADE BY: Westsid3r
**********************
*Thanks to Cookie.Ferdinand for the idea to make a map that looks like a cookie. I tried my best!*

Spawns: 32 (16 t, 16 ct)
Jails: 2 jails, 2 net traps that could be used as small jails, 1 milk glass (jail)
Shot4shot? yes
Gun toss? yes
Race? no
Arena? no

Includes:
*The terrorists spawn in the spaceship, which crashes on the planet cookie.
*After the crash, a hole will be made in the wall (rebel way)
*There are UFOs flying around the map, some of them will pick you up and give you a ride
*2 net traps, will close when touching/pressing/shooting the stick
*A launcher which sends you very far up in the air, surely breaks your bones
*Milk glass, works as jail

PICTURES
1. View from simon wall
2. View from above
3. View from a spinning tower thingie
4. View from behind simon wall
5. The launcher, enter it to be launched real far up in the air (a trap)
6. The map

Special thanks to:
EastSider, for pakratting the map and for support
karatek√§fer, for his awesome skybox

Heres a video that shows how the map looks like:
NOTE: the skybox is unchanged there since the vid is old

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mrdPnCrk-Qw&feature=channel_page
